text:
-jaq ud-BRu#taqM ~Mvanaqspati#ByaqH paryABRu#taq(gm)q saha#H | 
aqpAmOqjmAnaqM pariq gOBiqrAvRu#taqmindra#syaq vajra(gm)# haqviShAq ratha#M ~Myaja || 
indra#syaq vajrO# maqrutAqmanI#kaM miqtrasyaq garBOq varu#Nasyaq nABi#H | 
sEmAM nO# haqvyadA#tiM juShAqNO dEva# rathaq prati# haqvyA gRu#BAya || 
upa# SvAsaya pRuthiqvImuqta dyAM pu#ruqtrA tE# manutAqM ~MviShThi#taqM jaga#t | 
sa du#nduBE saqjUrindrE#Na dEqvairdUqrA- [  ] 32
